text: RCS (A.P.) flag రైతుకూలీ సంఘం (ఆంధ్రప్రదెౕశ్)/ Raitu Coolie Sangham (Andhra Pradesh) (Farmers Labourers League (Andhra Pradesh)) is a revolutionary peasants' movement in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, related to the Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist). The secretary of the organization is Kotaiah and the president Sinhadrai Jhansi.The Hindu .Three-day meet of Rytu Coolie Sangham gets under wayThe Hindu. Fight for your due, girijans toldThe Hindu. `Globalisation forcing farmers into death trap'The Hindu. Farmers told to launch united struggle against fiscal policies ==References== Category:Organisations based in Andhra Pradesh Category:Politics of Andhra Pradesh
title: Raitu Coolie Sangham (Andhra Pradesh)
